title: All the Right Moves
description: Life for Lilah has become too predictable. Convinced she needs a bit of a challenge and change of pace in her life, she moves away for college and embarks on a new journey of self-discovery.A college town, new friends, and a new romance with a mysterious older guy that may prove to be an even bigger challenge then she bargained for!Note: Not suitable for younger readers. Contains mature content including sexual situations.
author: Ever Leigh
